info.title: Emigo
info.description: Emigo enables effective management of field force teams (employees working in the field on smartphones or tablets). Increases their effectiveness in their daily activities. Emigo Connector interact with Power Platform services. It enables business & back-office users to access data from Emigo to automate data flows & streamline business processes and digitalization of workflows happening outside of Emigo system.
